pr_title: Adds support for continuous integration on travis by ensuring that ev…

timeline.bodyText: I would these changes to live in: https://github.com/fcrepo4/fcrepo4/blob/master/fcrepo-parent/pom.xml

timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -76,6 +76,18 @@

     <fcrepo.test.context.path />
   </properties>
+

timeline.message:
Adds support for continuous integration on travis by ensuring that every untagged commit to master  is
deployed to the sonatype snapshot repository.

Resolves the sonatype snapshot deployment part of  https://jira.lyrasis.org/browse/FCREPO-3291

timeline.bodyText:
I would suggest using the existing distributionManagement block: https://github.com/fcrepo4/fcrepo4/blob/20520a066407778627cf8500b49d039fbd80599e/fcrepo-parent/pom.xml#L571-L586
..and potentially align the serverId (https://github.com/fcrepo4/fcrepo4/pull/1673/files#diff-44094b67d49071d47bb32efe43678722R402).
